welcome_message_body: Welcome to London, a city known for its rich history, diverse culture, and iconic landmarks. Take in the charm of this bustling metropolis and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore the wonders of London!

restaurants.name: Los Mariachis
restaurants.description: Los Mariachis is a mexican restaurant located in London.
restaurants.address: 289 Lafayette St (at Keny Blvd), London, OH 43140

restaurants.name: Donatos Pizza
restaurants.description: Donatos Pizza is a pizzeria located in London.
restaurants.address: 229 Lafayette St (at Sheffield Blvd), London, OH 43140

restaurants.name: Ronetti's Pizza
restaurants.description: Ronetti's Pizza is a pizzeria located in London.
restaurants.address: 23 S Main St (at W 2nd St), London, OH 43140

restaurants.name: Wendy's
restaurants.description: Wendy's is a fast food restaurant located in London.
restaurants.address: 262 Lafayette St (at Keny Blvd), London, OH 43140

restaurants.name: Little Caesars Pizza
restaurants.description: Little Caesars Pizza is a pizzeria located in London.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport caters to the needs of VIP and business travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, duty-free shopping, and currency exchange services.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly European and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly long-haul flights for SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The original terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but access to certain websites and services may be restricted.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
